name: Veeeeraaaa, my sistaaa!
greetingText: I absolutely love your name, just like I love you!
wishText: May your hugs always be as warm and comforting as they are! ❤️
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's exactly what I was going to say.
text4: Because I realized, you deserve something
text5Content: You are my safe space, my comfort, my best hug! 🫂
outroText: Sending you the tightest virtual hug ever!! 🤗💖
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
